title: VEON,  Jazz delegation visits PTA headquarters
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 11 (APP):A high-level delegation from VEON Group and Jazz visited the Pakistan Telecommunication Authority (PTA), engaging in productive discussions with Chairman PTA, Major General (R) Hafeez Ur Rehman, on strategic initiatives to further digital transformation across Pakistan.
According to a news release, the delegation, led by Augie K Fabela, Founder & Chairman of the Board, VEON Group, included VEON Group’s Chief Executive Officer Kaan Terzioglu, Group Director of Corporate Affairs Marine Babayan, Jazz CEO Aamir Ibrahim, and Jazz VP of Public Policy and Regulatory Affairs Muddassar Hussain.
During the meeting, the Chairman PTA highlighted PTA’s initiatives to create a robust environment for digital growth, ensuring seamless connectivity and support for the ICT sector.
The VEON and Jazz delegation expressed appreciation for the PTA’s proactive measures in fostering a digital-friendly landscape and reiterated their commitment to supporting Pakistan’s journey toward a connected and empowered digital economy.
